Energized allies gain {{Color|d|+30% attack and movement speed}}, and ALWAYS land {{Color|d|critical strikes}} with {{Color|u|electric}} items and attacks.

desc: Picking up {{Color|d|an item or other collectible}} increases {{Color|u|all stats}} by {{Color|u|+3%}} for 20 seconds, up to {{Color|u|3 {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} times}}. Barrels grant minor pickups.

{{Color|hp|Reduces your stats while in combat}}, but {{Color|u|send this item to an enemy}} on hit. On death, this item will be sent to its holder's killer.

Reduces {{Color|d|damage}} by 30% {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}, {{Color|d|attack speed}} by 30% {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}, {{Color|u|movement speed}} by 30% {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}}, and {{Color|u|armor}} by 35 {{Stack|(+15 per stack)}}.

Increases {{Color|u|movespeed}} by {{Color|u|+30%}}.

When the Tonic wears off, you have a {{Color|hp|20%}} chance to gain a {{Color|hp|Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats}} by {{Color|hp|-5%}} {{Stack|(-5% per stack)}}.
